alert.note: Alert for Leon; Milam; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Robertson, northeastern Milam and southwestern Leon Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1045 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Boggy State Park to near Hearne. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hearne, Franklin, Calvert, Fort Boggy State Park, Camp Creek Lake, Hilltop Lakes, Redland, Normangee, Leona, Crossroads, Easterly, Benchley, Robbins, New Baden, Wheelock, Mumford, Branchville, Gause, Flynn and Ridge. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 152 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
